en-US: The hive you choose is located in the People's Republic of China. You may not be able to access the hive in some specific countries and regions. In addition, the Chinese government will have access to your data, and you will also be subject to Chinese laws and regulations.
zh-CN: 您选择的蜂巢位于中华人民共和国，您可能无法在一些特定的国家和地区访问。另外，中国政府将有权访问您的数据，您也会受到中国的法律的约束。
